title: The default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value that is set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value in the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Save the changes.
5. Open the report parameter settings again.
OB: The default value that is set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value in the list box should remain as 'aaa' even after modifying the default value to 'bbb'. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value in the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the default value to 'bbb'.
4. Save the changes.
5. Open the report parameter settings again and observe that the default value in the list box is 'aaa' and the OK button is grayed out.
